posts.title: The Iceman Cometh (1973)
posts.excerpt: Quote:A salesman with a sudden passion for reform has an idea to sell to his barfly buddies: throw away your pipe dreams. The drunkards, living in a flophouse above a saloon, resent the idea.

posts.title: War Requiem
posts.excerpt: War Requiem is a 1989 film adaptation of Benjamin Britten’s musical piece of the same name. It was shot in 1988 by the British film director Derek Jarman with the 1963 recording as the soundtrack, produced by Don Boyd and financed by the BBC. Decca Records required that the 1963 recording be heard on its …

posts._title: Jaromil Jires – Mladý muz a bílá velryba AKA The Young Man and Moby Dick (1979)
posts.title: Mladý muz a bílá velryba
posts.excerpt: Viktor is a prime example of passivity, he “lives as if he had everything already behind him”. Břéťa is a “charged solar battery, that keeps on charging energy”. Between these two men there enters a woman, Edita, who is uncompromisingly career oriented.
posts.titleEnglish: The Young Man and Moby Dick

posts._title: Yôji Yamada – Otoko wa tsurai yo: Shiretoko bojo aka Tora-san 38: Goes North (1987)
posts.title: Otoko wa tsurai yo: Shiretoko bojo
posts.excerpt: Quote:Tora-san, the näive and romantic peddler, returns once more to his home in Hokkaido where, as usual, he falls in love with a lovely young lady. The girl this time is Rinko Ueno, who has come home in an attempt to repair her relationship with her gruff veterinarian father, Junkichi ‘Jun’ Ueno. Tora-san gets caught …

posts.title: The Blue Bird
posts.excerpt: Quote:Wildly inventive and effortlessly enchanting, Maurice Tourneur’s legendary 1918 fantasy The Blue Bird combines spectacular costumes, lavish sets, ingenious camera effects and disarmingly naturalistic performances in a wholly original American silent film masterpiece. Tourneur’s extravagant vision anticipates the spellbinding German Expressionism of The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari, made the following year, while affectionately evoking the …

posts._title: Rex Ingram – The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse (1921)
posts.title: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
posts.excerpt: Plot Summary:Madariaga is an Argentinian cattle baron with two daughters: one married a Frenchman, the other a German. Madariaga favors his French grandson, Julio, as his heir, but Julio is a wastrel and rake whose greatest achivement is tangoing well. When Madariaga dies, his fortune is split between his daughters. The German side of the …

posts.title: The Scream
posts.excerpt: Quote:The Scream, a 63-minute sequence depicting nude bodies engaged in variations of cathartic experience, is projected on eleven separate channels across five walls, with a three-second delay for each channel at its Hong Kong premiere along with the new gallery installation, The Bare Life.

posts.title: Canción sin nombre
posts.excerpt: Based on harrowing true events, SONG WITHOUT A NAME tells the story of Georgina, an indigenous Andean woman whose newborn baby is whisked away moments after its birth in a downtown Lima clinic – and never returned. Stonewalled by a byzantine and indifferent legal system, Georgina approaches journalist Pedro Campas, who uncovers a web of …

posts._title: Mika Kaurismäki – L.A. Without A Map (1998)
posts.title: LA Without A Map
posts.excerpt: plot outline: After a chance meeting in a Bradford cemetery with Barbara, a young American actress, aspiring writer Richard Tennant breaks off his engagement, quits the undertaking business and heads off to LA to find true love with Barbara. But once there, Richard finds he has a rival in Patterson, a rising film director, who …

posts._title: José Luis Torres Leiva – Vendrá la muerte y tendrá tus ojos AKA Death Will Come and Shall Have Your Eyes (2019)
posts.title: Vendrá la muerte y tendrá tus ojos
posts.excerpt: Quote:Two women who have shared a lifetime together are faced with the disease of one of them. The sick woman decides not to follow any treatment and they both move to a small house in the forest until the day death comes to their lives.
posts.titleEnglish: Death Will Come and Shall Have Your Eyes
